Textile Waste.title: Cotton Waste to Bioethanol
Textile Waste.feedstock: Post-consumer cotton textiles, cellulosic waste, enzymes, yeast
Textile Waste.technology: Shredders, hydrolysis reactors, fermentation tanks, distillation columns
Textile Waste.skills: Chemical Engineering, Microbiology, Process Operation, Supply Chain Management

Textile Waste.title: Cotton Waste to Glucose Syrup
Textile Waste.feedstock: Post-consumer cotton, superconcentrated hydrochloric acid (HCl) or sulfuric acid
Textile Waste.technology: Acid-resistant reactors, filtration systems, neutralization tanks, evaporators
Textile Waste.skills: Chemical Engineering, Industrial Chemistry, Safety Management

Textile Waste.title: Polycotton Waste to PEF Monomers
Textile Waste.process: Selective Hydrolysis (e.g., Avantium Dawn Technology), Catalytic Conversion
Textile Waste.technology: Specialized hydrolysis reactors, catalytic converters, separation units
Textile Waste.skills: Organic Chemistry, Catalysis, Chemical Engineering, Polymer Science

Plastic Waste.title: Mixed Plastic Waste to Fuel Oil
Plastic Waste.feedstock: Mixed post-consumer plastics (PE, PP, PS), catalyst
Plastic Waste.product: Diesel-like fuel oil, gasoline fraction, gas fraction
Plastic Waste.technology: Pyrolysis reactor, catalytic cracking unit, distillation columns
Plastic Waste.skills: Chemical Engineering, Process Control, Thermochemical Conversion

E-Waste.title: Printed Circuit Boards to Precious Metals
E-Waste.feedstock: End-of-life printed circuit boards (PCBs), leaching chemicals
E-Waste.process: Mechanical Processing, Hydrometallurgical Leaching, Selective Precipitation
E-Waste.technology: Shredders, leaching tanks, precipitation vessels, filtration equipment
E-Waste.skills: Metallurgical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Analytical Chemistry

Food Waste.title: Orange Peels to Limonene
Food Waste.technology: Steam generator, distillation unit, condensers, separation equipment
Food Waste.skills: Chemical Engineering, Essential Oil Production, Quality Control

Agricultural Waste.title: Rice Husks to Silica
Agricultural Waste.skills: Materials Science, Process Engineering, Inorganic Chemistry

Construction Waste.title: Concrete Waste to Aggregates
Construction Waste.technology: Jaw crushers, impact crushers, screening equipment, magnetic separators
Construction Waste.skills: Civil Engineering, Materials Testing, Equipment Operation

Biomass Waste.title: Sawdust to Furfural
Biomass Waste.feedstock: Sawdust, lignocellulosic waste, dilute sulfuric acid
Biomass Waste.skills: Chemical Engineering, Bioproduct Development, Process Control

Glass Waste.title: Waste Glass to Foam Glass
Glass Waste.feedstock: Mixed waste glass, foaming agent (SiC, CaCO3)
Glass Waste.technology: Glass crushers, mixers, tunnel kiln, annealing lehr
Glass Waste.skills: Materials Engineering, Thermal Processing, Quality Control
